summary: The implementation provides a comprehensive Instagram-like social media application with authentication, user profiles, follow system, stories, reels, and chat functionality. Most requirements are implemented, though there are notable gaps in the feed display logic and some backend API endpoints. The UI design meets the modern aesthetic requirements with proper navigation and layouts.

missing_requirements.requirement: Chat history is preserved and retrievable
missing_requirements.reason: The backend stores messages in a single Map keyed by message ID, but there's no clear conversation-based retrieval or indexing. The frontend useGetMessages hook is referenced but the backend getMessages implementation is truncated and unclear if it properly retrieves conversation history between two users.

missing_requirements.requirement: Home feed displays content from followed users
missing_requirements.reason: HomePage.tsx is added but truncated. The evidence does not show the feed filtering logic that would display only posts/reels/stories from followed users. Without this filtering, the feed would show all content rather than personalized content.

missing_requirements.requirement: Feed updates when new content is available
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of polling, refetch intervals, or manual refresh mechanisms in the feed implementation. The HomePage component and related query hooks don't show refresh or update logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Delete reel functionality with trash button in ReelCard component
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify deletion capabilities for reels. REQ-4 only mentions uploading, displaying, liking, and viewing reels on profiles.
